alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Crook; Weston (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 28 at 3:28PM MDT until May 28 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CAMPBELL...NORTHWESTERN WESTON AND SOUTHERN CROOK COUNTIES... At 328 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Weston to 4 miles southwest of Moorcroft to 6 miles southwest of Upton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 60 mph winds 6 SSE of Gillette, WY. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Upton, Moorcroft, Oshoto, Carlile, Inyan Kara Mountain, Devils Tower Junction, Devils Tower National Monument, Moskee and Sundance. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 115 and 186. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
